name: Wyvernspur's Smite
S0D: A creature of your choice that you can see within range is empowered with the might of Wyvernspur, and their weapon glows with radiant energy.
S1D: The next time the target hit a creature with a weapon attack before this spell ends, their weapon gleams with astral radiance as they strike. The attack deals an extra 2d6 radiant damage.
S2D: The damaged creature now sheds a dim light in a 5-foot radius for the duration of the spell. The creature is now visible and any form of invisibility is impossible until the spell ends.
entriesHigherLevel: When you use this magical ability at higher levels, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each caster level above 2nd.
